Interests

Apart from programming, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the summer, my favorite sports are badminton, free walk and mountain climbing. I like to see the maple leaves in autumn when climbing mountain.

When staying indoors, I would like to watch suspense genre movies and television shows, I am also a big fan of Korean variety shows which are rally funny and relaxing. In addition, I spend a large amount of my free time learning new skills and exploring the latest technology about the software development.
